modName: Custom Skyrim Main Menu Music and Pics
summary: 20 custom pics and 9 music tracks for Skyrim main menu.
descriptionHtml:
Hi. Here is 20 custom pics and 9 music tracks for Skyrim menu for 16:9 monitors.Â 

[youtube]PXtRjW0IFKE[/youtube]

[u][color=#93c47d]Install[/color][/u]
Just select picture and a music track, which u liked and drop them in Data folder.

[u][color=#e06666]Warning
[/color][/u]For this mod I used screenshots with 1920x1080 res.
[u][color=#6d9eeb]
Credits[/color][/u]
1. All screens i did myself in heavy moded Skyrim) And did a lot of work in paint.net to give them a better view.
2. Music custom too) Thanks S. Kosin (https://soundcloud.com/sergey-zladei)
3. Thanks to all moders, whose works I used in Skyrim.
author: Kalusk
